text: March of the Penguins is a documentary about Emperor penguins. It won an Academy Award and was directed by Luc Jacquet. It was made in France. ==Related pages== *Penguin Town ==Other websites== * * * Category:2000s documentary movies Category:2005 movies Category:French documentary movies Category:Academy Award winning movies Category:Movies about penguins Category:2000s English-language movies Category:French-language movies Category:Multilingual movies Category:Buena Vista International movies
title: March of the Penguins
